May the name of Jesus, be glorified in all His saints, who pleased Him with their deeds, and among them Bashnouna the martyr.

This is he who became a monk, in Abba Makari's monastery, he was a righteous monk, steadfast in the true faith.

They took him and threw him, to be burned in fire, he was martyred and buried, in St. Sergius' Church.

Blessed is he, who sold his worldly possessions, and bought the true jewel, which is the Lord Jesus Christ.

Hail to you O martyr, who loved Christ, whose body is in the Churches, of Saints Sergius and George.

Pray to the Lord on our behalf, O pure and God-loving, Bashnouna the monk, that He may forgive us our sins.
أطلب من الرب عنا/ يا محب الله الطاهر/ بشنونة الراهب/ لكى يغفر لنا خطايانا.
